THREAD We feared and expected that far too many people with learning disabilities are dying far too early due to Covid19. CQC data published today confirms this https://t.co/iIrhNFcUcO. A short thread as I take this in. 1/13

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.

Trump fired tear gas and rubber bullets on peaceful protestors so he could get a photo opp in front a church that didn't want him there, holding a Bible from which he cannot name a single verse, all to prove he's not a coward hiding in his bunker again. A perfect encapsulation.

What we've witnessed in the past 24 hours are Trump's white supremacists committin' violence in the streets, givin' Trump the rationale to use the military to shut down public outcry.Rest assured, this is a dry run for November.
Senator McConnell confirming more judges, as the nation is literally bleeding, with the votes of the same Senators who refused to convict Trump at his impeachment trial.
